lead_paragraph: A total of 23 people from Guatemala, Honduras and Mexico were in the cab and bed of the truck when the driver lost control.
snippet: A total of 23 people from Guatemala, Honduras and Mexico were in the cab and bed of the truck when the driver lost control....

headline.print_headline: 14 Illegal Immigrants Are Killed When Pickup Truck Crashes in Texas
headline.main: 14 Illegal Immigrants Are Killed When Pickup Truck Crashes in Texas

abstract: Texas authorities say that fourteen illegal immigrants were killed in rural South Texas after the pickup truck they were riding in veered off a highway and struck two trees; crash is one of the deadliest single-vehicle accidents in the region, where a series of crashes involving vehicles filled with illegal immigrants have claimed numerous lives in recent months and years.
